name: GROTTO (MEGAGRAFX)
description:
GROTTO

GROTTO is a roguelike-like platformer about lost guys.

STORY

Five friends walked in the far lands: Robby 5 the Red Cardinal, George Washington the Frog, Vanessa the Dog, Jean-Michel the Dolphin and Choo the Rabbit.
-----------------
And suddenly they realized that they were lost.
But Choo decides to go further and leaves the others.
And he does not return...

Who will come back for him? CONTROLS

A and D  - LEFT and RIGHT
SPACE - JUMP

I - FULLSCREEN

M - TOGGLE MUSIC
N - TOGGLE SOUNDS
L - TOGGLE LIGHTNINGS

POSTER MEGAGRAFX VK PAGE
